description: Details pursuant to partial discharge of condition 36 (Bird Hazard Management Plan) of Full Planning Permission reference 20/0701 dated 16 March 2023 for demolition of existing buildings and structures on the site, all site preparation works for a residential led mixed-use development comprising new homes, associated car and cycle spaces, a replacement nursery, commercial space, associated highways improvements, open space, hard and soft landscaping and public realm works subject to a deed of agreement under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act dated the 16th of March 2023.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Land adjacent to Northwick Park Hospital, Nightingale Avenue, London, HA1 3GX
